about.description: Benemoy Securities Limited was incorporated with the Registrar of Joint Stock Companies and Firms (RJSC) vide registration no.C-169369/2021 with effect from 2nd March 2021 as a private limited company limited by shares having its registered office at Swantex Bhaban (5th Floor), 9/i Motijheel Commercial Area, Dhaka-1000 under the Companies Act 1994

card.about_desc: Benemoy Securities Limited always tries to ensure safe & secure trading for their valuable clients.
Benemoy Securities team is always concerned to solve any kind of stock market-related problem for their clients.
Benemoy Securities team is always concerned to solve any kind of stock market-related problem for their clients.

about_ideas.about_ideas_title: We Create Great Ideas For Your Products & Services
about_ideas.about_ideas_desc: Benemoy Securities Limited was incorporated with the Registrar of Joint Stock Companies and Firms (RJSC) vide registration no.C-169369/2021 with effect from 2nd March 2021 as a private limited company limited by shares having its registered office at Swantex Bhaban (5th Floor), 9/i Motijheel Commercial Area, Dhaka-1000 under the Companies Act 1994.
about_ideas.about_ideas_desc_2: The Company is to be engaged with the business of Trading Right Entitlement Certificate (TREC) in favor of any person as may be required to be admitted for the purpose of running the business of the exchange and to deal as stock or broker business in accordance BSEC (Trading Right Entitlement Certificate)Rules, 2020 and Dhaka Stock Exchange (Administration of Trading Right Entitlement Certificate) Regulations, 2020 and relevant laws, rules & regulations issued by respective authorities.
